alert.note: Alert for Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 05 at 2:25PM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens affecting Pasco County. .Heavy rain over the past week will cause the Cypress Creek near Worthington Gardens to rise into Minor Flood Stage. For the Cypress Creek...including SR 54 Worthington Gardens...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Flooding begins at the recreation area on State Road 54. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening and continue rising to a crest of 8.2 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.2 feet on 08/12/2012. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Cypress Creek SR 54 Worthington 8.0 7.9 Mon 2 pm 8.1 8.2 8.1 7.9 7.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1100 PM EDT.
